short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily capture your day-to-day work and send it to your weeknotes.fun account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The weeknotes.fun extension allows you to capture screenshots of your browser and send them to your account for processing, so you can effortlessly track your work and have it tagged and sorted for later.

Coming soon:
- Send voice memos direct from Chrome
- Capture apps outside of your browser window
- Want more? Let us know on https://weeknotes.fun
